entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries becoming mixed with rain showers in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 09 March 2023
